node.detail_zh: 患者於 7 月 24 日曾與 Star Global 直銷群組人士共十多人到長洲遊玩，無外遊紀錄，7 月 27 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient gathered in Cheung Chau with the cluster of more than 10 people related to direct marketing company Star Global, with no travel history, and developed symptoms on July 27.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 位於何文田怡安閣的 Star Global 直銷的職員及其接觸者群組，除數位是緊密接觸者外，其餘均是員工。公司會辦紅酒、化妝品等展銷，並會舉辦講座，曾有百多人到過該處。亦有人到太子利美大廈 / 尖沙咀新文華中心培訓或開會，部分患者曾一起用膳及同遊長洲。
groups.description_en: This cluster accounts for the individuals associated with the direct marketing company Star Global in Yee On Court, Ho Man Tin, including employees and their close contacts. Most of the individuals in the cluster are employees, with a few close contacts. The company holds exhibitions for red wines and cosmetic products as well as hosting lectures. A recent event had around 100 participants. Some of them had been to Lee May Building, Prince Edward and New Mandarin Plaza, Tsim Sha Tsui for trainings or meetings. Some of them had meals together and went to Cheung Chau together.

node.location_en: Kin Ching House, Kin Ming Estate
